Description: The United States has extended Covid 19 restrictions on non essential travel at land and ferry crossings with Canada and Mexico until July 21, according to a tweet from the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) on Sunday
Title: US extends Covid 19 travel restrictions with Canada and Mexico
Author: By Rashard Rose, CNN
